=Features=

PHPApp is a web application framework for PHP and MySQL.  It uses
!ModelQuery for data access, and provides shared application services
and a powerful administraton site builder.

==Application Services==

The [http://home.jongsma.org/software/phpapp/docs/phpdoc/phpapp-core/Application.html Application]
object is the central interface for interacting with your PHPApp
application.  The Application object provides services such as:

  * Database access (via ModelQuery)
  * User authentication
  * Checking user permissions
  * Content caching (user, session, or global)
  * Sending emails
  * Logging

See the [PHPAppTutorial tutorial] for more details on
[PHPAppApplication using the Application object].

==Administration Site Builder==

PHPApp's killer feature is the administration site builder.  Using the
field definitions from your ModelQuery models, along with additional
metadata defined in [PHPAppModelAdmin ModelAdmin definitions], PHPApp
allows you to quickly and easily generate beautiful, easy to use
administration interfaces:
